name: The Un's Stable
description:
Howdy!

Welcome to The Un's Stable. Uncle Un is an old farmer who needs help with his animals. The job is to keep animals populations stable. If any of animals go extinct Un will get mad for sure. 

The game is a turn based strategy with auto battler feature. Each turn animals will inform player about their move plans that will be executed on the next turn. Player can use cards to perform actions that will impact those decisions. Prevent destabilization from species extinction by keeping at least one animal of each species alive for as long as you can. 

Oh... can you also finish any of quests that Un left for you? Those surely are pretty when they get some colors.

The game was created for 49th Ludum Dare Jam in 72 hour - see submition page here.

Programming: 

- Kongo 

- Cieku 

Graphics: 

- Diler 

- Deav 

Music: 

- JayaSheel (theme inspired by The Hounted McMansion by Megabit Melodies)

Good luck to you!
